Name: Cursed Sight
About the game: Being able to control fate would be a blessing for many. To Miyon, it is her greatest curse. East and West Taria are in conflict, and Miyon's power is the key to their victory. Meanwhile, Gai has been sold by his family into Miyon's temple. Will the two save or destroy one another? * * * The third game developed by InvertMouse, this time with branching narratives. Join Gai and Miyon in their struggle against fate. May you find the experience worthwhile!
Meta Title: Cursed Sight: Aug 3, 2015, InvertMouse and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Cursed Sight? Check out the release date (Aug 3, 2015), developer insights from InvertMouse, and a complete game summary.
